com.antlersoft.android.bc

类 BCFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.antlersoft.android.bc.BCFactory

  • public class BCFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Create interface implementations appropriate to the current version of the SDK; implementations can allow use of higher-level SDK calls in .apk's that will still run on lower-level SDK's
    作者:
    Michael A. MacDonald

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BCFactory() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      IBCActivityManager getBCActivityManager()
      Return the implementation of IBCActivityManager appropriate for this SDK level
      IBCGestureDetector getBCGestureDetector()
      Return the implementation of IBCGestureDetector appropriate for this SDK level Since we dropped support of SDK levels < 3, there is only one version at the moment.
      IBCHaptic getBCHaptic()
      Return the implementation of IBCHaptic appropriate for this SDK level Since we dropped support of SDK levels prior to 3, there is only one version at the moment.
      IBCMotionEvent getBCMotionEvent()
      Return the implementation of IBCMotionEvent appropriate for this SDK level
      static BCFactory getInstance()
      Returns the only instance of this class, which manages the SDK specific interface implementations
      IBCScaleGestureDetector getScaleGestureDetector(Context context, OnScaleGestureListener listener)
      Return an instance of an implementation of IBCScaleGestureDetector appropriate to the SDK of this device.
      IBCStorageContext getStorageContext()

      • getScaleGestureDetector

        public IBCScaleGestureDetector getScaleGestureDetector(Context context,
                                              OnScaleGestureListener listener)
        Return an instance of an implementation of IBCScaleGestureDetector appropriate to the SDK of this device. This will work very much like android.view.ScaleGestureDetector on SDK >= 5. For previous SDK versions, it is a dummy implementation that does nothing and will never call the listener.

        Note that unlike the other methods in this class, the returned interface instance is not stateless.

        参数:
        context - The context to which the detector is applied
        listener - The listener to which the implementation will send scale events
        返回:
        The gesture detector

      • getStorageContext

        public IBCStorageContext getStorageContext()
        返回:
        An implementation of IBCStorageContext appropriate for the running Android release

      • getInstance

        public static BCFactory getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of this class, which manages the SDK specific interface implementations
        返回:
        Factory instance
